=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: R RACILY HAIR Racily Hair 8A Ombre Brazilian Hair 3/4 Bundles Kinky Curly Unprocessed Virgin Brazilian Hair Black to Dark Brown 2 Tone #1B 30 Curly Weave Human Hair (14" 16" 18")
Review Date: 2017/08/10
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13 x 8 x 2 inches; 12 Ounces', 'UPC': '718040918840'}
Review Text: Will definitely order again.  Longer next time.  This time, I got the 14,16,18. The color is gorgeous and a true 30 color.  I did lightly bleach it to bring that ombre 30 higher/closer to the weft (I wanted the lighter color closer to my eye area and not just on the bottom half of the hair. I attached photos to show how the curl pattern was affected by the bleach (deep curl pattern still in effect, just went from a deep 4a to a 3b/3c (see the third pic).  In that 3rd pic, the first piece of hair is out of the pack, not washed or dyed; the second piece of hair is the bleached portion, and the third piece is just cowashed.  You can see beautiful curls in all three parts, so feel free to wash or bleach, the curls seem to be here to stay. Lastly, the length is very true (slightly longer, actually).
Review Title: Yes, yes, yes!!!!!  I hope this seller stays in business 4ever!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Fengde Hair 8A Ombre Brazilian Deep Wave Virgin Hair One Bundle 100% Unprocessed Human Hair Extensions(24,1B/30)
Review Date: 2017/12/30
Store: NewRang
Average Rating: 3.1

Review Text: The least amount of tangling of all the brands I've tried so far.  THe color is a shiny 27/30 color.  I wiish it came in 26".  Will def buy again.

Product Title: Racily Hair 8A Brazilian Kinky Curly Ombre Hair Extensions 3 Pcs 2 Tone 1B 30# Ombre Brazilian Curly Virgin Hair (12"14"16")
Review Date: 2018/03/01
Store: R RACILY HAIR
Average Rating: 2.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'R RACILY HAIR', 'Extension Length': '12 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.35 x 7.72 x 2.24 inches; 10.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '783057242585'}
Review Text: Will definitely order again. Longer next time. This time, I got the 14,16,18. The color is gorgeous and a true 30 color. I did lightly bleach it to bring that ombre 30 higher/closer to the weft (I wanted the lighter color closer to my eye area and not just on the bottom half of the hair. I attached photos to show how the curl pattern was affected by the bleach (deep curl pattern still in effect, just went from a jerry-4a to a 3b/3c (see the first and second pics). In that 2nd pic, the first section of hair is out of the pack, not washed or dyed; the second section of hair is the bleached portion, and the third piece is not bleached, only just cowashed. You can see beautiful curls in all three section, so feel free to wash or bleach (be careful, though), the curls seem to be here to stay. Lastly, the length is very true (slightly longer, actually).
Review Title: Yes, yes, yes!!!!! I hope this seller stays in business 4ever! Wish I could order single bundles...
Rating: 5.0

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BEYELIAN Premade Ultra Volume Eyelash Extensions 8D 0.07mm 10mm C Curl Express Cluster Lash Extensions
Review Date: 2018/07/31
Store: BEYELIAN
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BEYELIAN', 'Material': 'Polyester, Polybutylene Terephthalate Fiber', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4.7 x 1.96 x 0.39 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Individual', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.7 x 1.96 x 0.39 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'UPC': '712022597757'}
Review Text: Was disappointed at first sight because of how thin the individual lashes used to make the clusters were...until I put them on. They do not fail to fan out and quickly make themselves known.  Being so light keeps them from weighing down my own fragile lashes, which is a good thing.  I do have that glam look now and plan to keep that way...until I get bored.
Review Title: Will buy again.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Electric Shavers for Women, 4 in 1 Ladies Cordless Rechargeable Painless Hair Remover for Eyebrows, Nasal Hair, Underarms, Bikini Area and Whole Body- Safe, Gentle Shaving Razor Systems -Pink Gold …
Review Date: 2018/09/04
Store: FOXCESD
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '666354185604'}
Review Text: It seems you should go in one direction or it will pull the hair a bit.  In the other direction (you'll have to discover which way for your self), it is completely painless.  Even in the 'wrong' direction, it's not bad and I'm not super pain tolerant. Needs no batteries, so that's great, too.
Review Title: So far, so good
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Moda Mode Kinky Curly Human Hair Weave Virgin Hair Extensions Unprocessed Brazilian Human Hair Curly Wavy Hair 3 Bundles Natural Black (20 22 24 Inch)
Review Date: 2019/05/13
Store: Moda Mode
Average Rating: 2.7
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.8 x 7.1 x 2.2 inches; 9.44 Ounces', 'UPC': '611029564451'}
Review Text: I bought the curly wavy version of this hair (is tighter than wavy  but that's what I wanted) and I bought the kinky curly version of this hair.  Both take bleaching very well without losing the curl integrity (very important to me).  I mean, I bleached and toned and bleached again to get to the 27 color and the hair didn't fry.  The curly wavy still looks great after three months and I expect the kinky curly probably will, too.  Love this company and will continue to buy from them as long as the prices are this great.
Review Title: BUY THIS FREAKING HAIR!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 18 Inch Medium Length Clip in Hair Extensions #12 Blonde Highlighted with #613 Blonde Human Hair Kinkys Curly Clip in Hair Extensions Real Human Hair Double Weft 100g/pack
Review Date: 2019/08/15
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Clip-In', 'Item Weight': '3.52 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was the customer who specifically asked the seller if the hair was kinky curly as in the photo on the right or loose like the model's hair.  As you can read, I was told the hair was kinky curly.  Silky with crimps is not kinky curly nor does it look like the photo. I give it 2 stars because the color is as it says.  Very disappointed as this was a complete waste of money as it does not blend in with kinky curly hair as I was led to believe.
Review Title: Not even close
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has expressed satisfaction with several hair-related purchases, particularly appreciating the quality and aesthetics of the hair extensions. Reviews highlight the beauty of colors, curl patterns, and the versatility of the products, with strong endorsements of repurchasing. Positive experiences also included minimal tangling and efficacy in various applications like bleached hair maintenance. The user overall seems to enjoy well-performing hair accessories and extensions, frequently noting the likelihood of ordering again and enjoying the end results.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
There are notable frustrations in the user’s experiences, especially with regard to the performance of specific beauty products. Several reviews mention dissatisfaction with the effectiveness of eyebrow tattoo equipment, citing inadequate depth for dye permanence and mediocre results. Additionally, there are complaints about misleading descriptions concerning hair textures, with certain products not matching the advertised features, leading to disappointment and perceived wasted purchases. Overall, inconsistent product quality detracted from their shopping experience.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user’s shopping history reflects a mix of positive and negative experiences centered around beauty and hair products. While they have had commendable purchases that resulted in repeat orders and satisfaction with quality, challenges arose from certain products underperforming against expectations. Notable frustrations include subpar effects from a tattoo machine and misleading product representations concerning hair texture. Despite these setbacks, the user remains engaged, highlighting a willingness to continue shopping for preferred brands while navigating through mixed-quality experiences.

target_interaction.title: Not curly at all
target_interaction.text: It's actually silky with flattened crimps...won't blend with African American hair at all.  It was a complete waste of time and money.
